hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Correlation Spike on BTC Stress Events
hypothesis_content.statement: During STRESS regimes triggered by BTC drawdowns >15%, meme coins (DOGE, PEPE, TRUMP) will show accelerated correlation decay to BTC (beta dropping >0.3 within 3 days) while maintaining elevated correlation to each other (>0.7), creating pairs trading opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During severe BTC stress, meme coins often decouple from BTC as retail sentiment diverges, but maintain high intra-cohort correlation due to shared investor base. This creates relative value opportunities within the meme sector.
entry_conditions: Both coins' beta to BTC has decreased >0.3 in past 3 days

exit_conditions.take_profit: Pair correlation returns to within 0.15 of 30-day average or position reaches +15%
exit_conditions.stop_loss: -8% from entry or BTC drawdown exceeds 25%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Meme coin correlations to BTC remain stable or increase during stress events, or intra-pair correlations break down.
